text: Edwin Cole McCain (born January 20, 1970) is an American singer-songwriter and guitarist. == Early life == McCain was born in Charleston, South Carolina to Watt McCain and Wendy McCain. His parents are of Channel Islander (Jersey), Dutch, English, French, German, Irish, Italian, Lepane Native American, Northern Irish (Scotch-Irish), Powhatan Native American, Scottish and Welsh descent. == Career == His second album Misguided Roses, spawned I'll Be, a major hit single in 1998. == Band members == * Pete Riley - rhythm guitar, backing vocals * Larry Chaney - lead guitar * Craig Shields - keyboards, saxophone and other wind instruments * Jason Pomar - bass, backing vocals * Tez Sherand - drums, percussion == Discography == == Other websites == * Category:1970 births Category:20th-century American guitarists Category:20th- century American singers Category:21st-century American singer-songwriters Category:American rock guitarists Category:American rock singers Category:American television personalities Category:Living people Category:Musicians from South Carolina
title: Edwin McCain
